section.title: xcfyid.inc
section.programlisting: 00001 * ------------------- Fission Fragments yield and neutron multiplicity - 00002 PARAMETER (MAXFIS=50000,MAXENF=3,MXFELE=45,MAXNUF=20000) 00003 COMMON / XCFYID / NUMFIS,NUMNUF,NMFELE,IZAFRA(MAXFIS), 00004 + XBRFRA(MAXFIS,MAXENF),ENEFRA(MAXFIS,MAXENF), 00005 + BRRFRA(MAXFIS),IFSTA(MXFELE),IFLEN(MXFELE), 00006 + IFZMA(MXFELE),INSTA(MXFELE),INLEN(MXFELE), 00007 + XCONUF(MAXNUF),IZAPAR(MAXFIS) 00008 * 00009 * MAXFIS Maximum number of fission fragments data 00010 * MAXENF Maximum number of energies for fission fragments yields 00011 * MXFELE Maximum number of fissionable elements in store 00012 * MAXNUF Maximum number of fission multiplicity data 00013 * 00014 * NUMFIS Last used word in XCONUF 00015 * NUMNUF Number of fissionable elements with neutron mult. info 00016 * NMFELE Number of fissionable elements with fission frag. info 00017 * IZAFRA Material code of the fission fragment 00018 * XBRFRA Fission fragments data for different energies 00019 * ENEFRA Energies at which data XBRFRA are given 00020 * BRRFRA Interpoldated fission yields, work are used during 00021 * sampling 00022 * IFSTA Start of the fission yield information 00023 * IFLEN Length of the fission yield information 00024 * IFZMA Material code of the fissionable nuclide 00025 * INSTA Start of the fission neutron multiplicity information 00026 * INLEN Length of the fission neutron multiplicity information 00027 * XCONUF Fission neutron multiplicity parameters 00028 * IZAPAR Work area used for fissionable nuclides codes in XNEVOL 00029 * 00030 *-----------------------------------------------------------------------
